channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
I was wondering whats the best client + server to start out with.
I had a 2moons private server before but i am new to runescape private servers. Would be great if somene told me!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

m0n 1337:

hey guys uh i am useing deltascape but it keeps giveing me nulls when i start the server.

That is because there is probally anti leech.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

[quote=“time of rune, post:8, topic:295610”][quote author=Keegan_ link=topic=391602.msg2916323#msg2916323 date=1250465258]

Well i still does anyone know a good client + private server. I am learning java atm.

I am confused by what you mean, you say you have 2moons source, yet you are asking for a new source? Or are you basically just asking for a client and source to remake 2moons…?(Tbh, I have never heard of 2moons)
[/quote]
2moons is a different RPG game. Simaler to WoW, RS, etc. He has a private server, of a different game.[/quote]

Oooooooh, now i remember what 2moons is, sorry for misunderstanding.

And…

m0n 1337:

So deltascape is recommend for newbies like me making a rs private server with little knowledge of java?

Yeah try deltascape, but when you understand basic java, go to something better…

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“Keegan_, post:4, topic:295610”][quote author=m0n 1337 link=topic=391602.msg2916309#msg2916309 date=1250463694]
Well i still does anyone know a good client + private server. I am learning java atm.
[/quote]

I am confused by what you mean, you say you have 2moons source, yet you are asking for a new source? Or are you basically just asking for a client and source to remake 2moons…?(Tbh, I have never heard of 2moons)[/quote]
2moons is a different RPG game. Simaler to WoW, RS, etc. He has a private server, of a different game.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Keegan1 Keegan_
item.description:
@Keegan1 wrote:

m0n 1337:

I am asking for a runescape private server which is easy to understand. Like what source with client is best to make a runescape private server so me and my friends can play togather.

Ok, well, a source easy to understand is deltascape, since it has a fair amount of features in it already or use like devolution or emulous or Iclarity…

Read full topic
